item.title: Pick the right life partner
item.description: The most important choice you get to have is picking your life companion, and yet thereâ€™s not enough information on how to be good at it. Society and our biological clock pushes us to rush this decision when we should be thinking it through, the same way we spend a whole year in high school trying to decide on the perfect career path to follow, and just then, we take roughly 4 years studying how to be good at it.
